import React from "react"; import "./testimonial.css"; import profile1 from "../../assets/person.jpg"; import profile2 from "../../assets/PngItem_4042710.png"; import profile3 from "../../assets/kindpng_415494.png"; import arrow3 from "../../assets/Arrow1.png"; import { Testimonialdata } from "../../Appdata"; const Testimonial = () => { return ( <>
{Testimonialdata[0].span}

{Testimonialdata[0].Heading} {Testimonialdata[0].HeadingSpan}

{Testimonialdata[0].value1} {Testimonialdata[0].sign1}

{Testimonialdata[0].DownHeading}

{Testimonialdata[0].value2} {Testimonialdata[0].sign2}

{Testimonialdata[0].DownHeading2}

); }; export default Testimonial; function TestCard(props) { return ( <>

{props.name}

{props.designation}

{props.para}
); }
